file_content.text: Thanks again. We could use more like you.
Word is you secured the landing area. Good work.
War's never pretty, but I want you to know you're real heroes.
War's never pretty, but I want you to know you're a real hero.
It's important to remember we're fighting for peace on Ord Mantell.
I'm just doing my duty, Captain.
It was nothing.
You're a proud example of Havoc Squad, and the Republic military.
And credits, don't forget credits.
Also, the reward.
You earned them.
It's an honor to fight for the Republic.
Well said.
It's an honor to have you on our side.
Yeah, and hugs for everyone. Aren't you being a little idealistic?
You're naive.
I don't give up hope, not in the soldiers who fight or what they fight for.
Thank you for your efforts. Hopefully this fight's almost done.
Talk to Sergeant Vandal. He'll fill you in on the details.
Freelancer. I hear you've been mucking up the separatists' plans. Don't know what your investment in this war is, but we need all the help we can get.
So you're Havoc Squad, huh. Pleasure to meet you. Boys out here really look up to you special forces types.
This separatist business on Ord Mantell has gone on long enough, don't you think?
They can't hold out much longer.
It's almost over.
We've been saying that a while now. Let's make it come true.
Can't wait 'til it's over, sir.
Yes, sir.
It'll be good to stop smelling smoke for a while.
You can't walk two paces on this planet without getting shot at.
No kidding.
Can't say I'd recommend anyone doing business here, no matter how tough.
So what are we waiting for? Let's start filling some graves.
Let's finish it.
Morbid, but business-like.
My boys could use some support out at the sep stronghold. Trying to secure the landing area so we can bring more troops in.
But resistance is heavy, and they're taking a beating. You're not under my command, but I'd appreciate if you report to Sergeant Vandal and lend a hand.
No problem.
Nothing's free.
Republic doesn't ask a civilian to put himself in danger without reward. Help us, and you'll be compensated.
Right away, sir.
Good to hear.
Like I said, Sergeant Vandal's running the mission. I'll let the beach camp know you're coming.
Not interested. [Refuse quest]
More important than restoring peace and order to Ord Mantell? I'm sorry to hear that. I hope you change your mind.
Got too much on my hands right now. Sorry.
